1289170.name: Defenders of the West
1289170.description:
Defenders of the West is a classic tower defense game set in the wild west. It adds some unique twists to the classic genre and will appeal to players of all skill levels.
A large gang of bandits has organized into a small army. The old Marshall Robert B. Gun has enlisted you and some of his old friends to stop them.
The unique setting, beautiful, hand crafted environments, dynamic levels and a cool story with a pinch of humor set this game apart from other tower defense games.
A wide variety of enemies, towers with at least 3 upgrades each, perks and abilities combined with three levels of difficulty offer high replayability.
Set up your towers and watch the carnage unfold with a rotatable and zoom- able camera! Show those bandits what it means to be a Defender of the West!
1289170.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
